item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260110.6)
item.description:
What's New

Fix: 'gisup' producing 'gíúp' instead of 'giúp'

Bug: When typing 'gisup' (Telex), both vowels 'i' and 'u' got tone marks,

resulting in 'gíúp' instead of the expected 'giúp'.

Root cause: In checkMarkPosition(), insertMarkInternal() was called which

internally calls findAndCalculateVowel() with forGrammar: false. This changed

vowelStartIndex from including 'i' in 'gi' (forGrammar: true) to excluding it.

The final loop used the modified vowelStartIndex, missing the 'i' where the

mark was removed from typingWord but not sent to screen for update.

Fix: Save vowelStartIndex before calling insertMarkInternal() and use the

saved value in the final loop to ensure all vowels (including 'i' in 'gi')

are properly processed when sending charData back to screen.
